Package game

Class CluedoGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.CluedoGame
  • public class CluedoGame
extends java.lang.Object
    Game: Controls the steps of the game, creation of objects, and run time actions.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  CluedoGame.State
      State: - An enum to hold track of the current game status

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addNewUser()
      Creates a user and sets the name and sprite based on preset fields then Adds a new user to the list of users
      void checkAccusation​(Sprite sprite, Weapon weapon, Room room)
      checks the accused sprite weapon and room against the solution cards if the suggestion is wrong then the current player is out of the game if it is right the current player wins the game
      void checkSuggestion​(Sprite sprite, Weapon weapon, Room room)
      Runs through all the cards in other players hands and determines who is able to refute the claim first, if any.
      void confirmRestartGame()
      If the players have confirmed to restart the game, the restart the game else exit the game.
      void gameController()
      gameController: Maintains the order of the game
      java.util.Set<Sprite.SpriteAlias> getAvailableSprites()
      Returns a list of all the available sprites
      Board getBoard()
      Returns the board in the CluedoGame object
      User getCurrentUser()
      Returns the player who's turn it is
      GUI getGui()
      Returns the GUI object from the CluedoGame object
      int getMovesLeft()
      Returns the amount of moves the player has left in their turn
      User getOtherPlayer()
      Gets the player making a refute
      Card getOtherPlayerCard()
      Gets the card that the other player is using to refute a suggestion
      java.util.ArrayList<Card> getOtherPlayerHand()
      Gets the refuting players hand so that they can choose which card to refute with
      CluedoGame.State getState()
      Returns the state of this CluedoGame
      java.lang.String getTempUserName()
      Get the temporary user name, used during the setup of the game to ensure that the GUI displays the correct player name
      int getTempUserNum()
      Get the temporary user, used during the setup of the game to ensure that the GUI displays the correct player number
      static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)  
      void nextState()
      Goes to the next state of the CluedoGame, or Runs the GUI which will determine its own state
      void nextTempUserNum()
      Gets the next user to create if there are no more users to create it runs onto the next state
      void removeAvailableSprite​(Sprite.SpriteAlias s)
      Removes a sprite from being available, used after another character has selected their character
      void removeMovesLeft​(int usedMoves)
      Removes move that the player has left
      void restartGame()
      Dispose of the GUI and recreate the cludeoGame as this will restart the entire process
      int rollDie()
      Returns a randomly generated number between 1 and 6.
      void setMovesThisTurn​(int moves)
      Sets the amount of moves the user can use this turn, and resets the amount of moves the user has left this turn
      void setPlayerAmount​(int playerAmount)
      Sets the amount of players in this game
      void setShowOtherPlayerCard​(Card c)
      Sets the card to show another player when a suggestion has been refuted
      void setTempSprite​(Sprite.SpriteAlias sa)
      Sets the temporary sprite alias that the temporary user is going to be, used in between states when creating a character
      void setTempUserName​(java.lang.String un)
      Sets the temporary user name, used when inbetween states of creating the character

      • checkSuggestion

        public void checkSuggestion​(Sprite sprite,
                            Weapon weapon,
                            Room room)
        Runs through all the cards in other players hands and determines who is able to refute the claim first, if any.
        Parameters:
        sprite - - the suggested sprite card
        weapon - - the suggested weapon card
        room - - the suggested room card

      • checkAccusation

        public void checkAccusation​(Sprite sprite,
                            Weapon weapon,
                            Room room)
        checks the accused sprite weapon and room against the solution cards if the suggestion is wrong then the current player is out of the game if it is right the current player wins the game
        Parameters:
        sprite - - the accused sprite card
        weapon - - the accused weapon card
        room - - the accused room card
